A photorealistic photo of a super cute Japanese idol with a slim body, always smiling. She has fluffy light brown long hair with see-through bangs and sparkling brown eyes. She is wearing a white blouse with ruffles, a pink cardigan, a pale pink and gray checkered mini skirt, white knee high socks, and brown loafers. She has a small ribbon hair clip and a pink ribbon tie. Emphasize the absolute territory.
